subject: sorry Dave
author: bhali333
full_text:
Dave ,
Once again I hear nothing but noise in these files. the hello file is 
not evp, it sounds like you paused the recording to answer the phone 
maybe and caught yourself saying hello.

I'm going to make my offer again. If you are new to this and want some 
help getting started please e-mail me and I will gladly explain how to 
get successful evp.

Bruce
